title: Craft a Geo
desc: Hand over some playdough to your child and challenge them to craft various geometric shapes. Encourage combining shapes to create more complex structures or objects.

content.desc: Upload an image of your child's playdough creations
How did your child approach crafting various geometric shapes with playdough?
Did your child combine shapes to create more complex structures or objects?
Did your child express any challenges or joys while working with playdough?
